thread.title: New York vacation
thread.title_full: New York vacation - Review of Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Maureen B
title: New York vacation
text: We stayed at the homewood suites on 37th st. We were checked I. And received water on arrival. The suite was equipped with full kitchen and very comfortable king bed. The rio also had a sleeper couch but we did not use it. The hotel is near subway and time square. I would highly recommend this hotel. There is also a complementary breakfast which had something for everyone. The coffee, hot chocolate and tea was available all day with fresh baked cookies midday. I don't think anyone would be disappointed with the hotel or location I will certainly stay at the hotel again.there is also reasonable parking almost across the street which was very convenient.
